sentence: Both businessman Kevin Rinke and chiropractor Garrett Soldano each trail Whitmer by seven points, while conservative media personality Tudor Dixon is ten points behind Whitmer.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Tied with Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig in Michigan Governor's Race

sentence: Republican businessman Kevin Rinke is leading the Republican gubernatorial field in fundraising, including a $2 million contribution to his own campaign.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Republican candidate for Michigan governor sparks abortion controversy
